title: My Ahri Cosplay Attempt
body: First time cosplaying. :) Hope you enjoy it!

replies.body:
Thats really well done. nice work. 

PS how do sleeves stay up? #magic?

Hi Everyone!

Wow! I didn't really expect anyone to notice it but thank you soooo much for all the wonderful comments!!!

Sleeves are made out of a tougher material, so they stay up. (imagine holding up a piece of cardboard).

My photographer ended up taking a couple of shots- some with our own version of 'Ahri Skins'.

I'm looking for recommendations on who I should cosplay next actually! I've done Asuna and Kill la Kill.

Hoping to do more league cosplays. Any suggestions? :)
I have a challenge for you, A FUNCTIONING URGOT. I don't know if it's even possible, but hey it's worth a shot.
I Think you'd make an awesome Akali! {{champion:84}}
let me grab a poking stick. brb.
IF YOU LOVE ME LET ME GOOOOOOOOOO!{{summoner:6}}

Is pretty good, any alternate angle shots for better coverage of the outfit?

Any future plans for cosplay? More LoL Champs, or characters from other games/movies/etc?
